channel.title: Need Feedback
channel.description:
Hey guys, try to flame as little as possible.
I'm thinking starting a small web hosting business that will target the RSPS community.
It will include: VPS hosting Web Hosting Forum setup, etc A few other things
Now, here is the feedback I need.
How much would you pay per month for a VPS, and what specs would you hope to get (Please don't post anything idiotic, and I realize I am on mopar and 90% of the responses will be spam/flame, but try to refrain)
Same with web hosting.
Also, what operating system would you guys want?

item.title: Need Feedback
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

win 98
512mb ram

Best ever.

I knew this was coming.

win 95?
[/quote]Nah be hardcore and step it up to 98, pre-y2k is ftw.[/quote]

alrighty then.
For you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Feedback
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:17, topic:395496”][quote author=Rash link=topic=492691.msg3602817#msg3602817 date=1305770029]

Question before I give my input on price:

  1. Would you automatically be able to buy and instantly use?
  2. Would the stuff be ddos protected?

Not sure about instantly, but ddos protected yes.

But with Vpsland I enjoy getting my vps asap. If I have to rely on a buisness ran by one person I wouldn’t be expecting great service so I would pay very little.

VPSland have a 24 hour wait.
[/quote]

Either way I know I am 100% getting my vps then and I know that I will have it for a full month if I order it for a month.[/quote]

And when I start running this, it will be the exact same.

Read full topic

@i_code_rsps wrote:

Linux.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Feedback
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Well most private servers are hosted on Windows brand servers or linxus. Windows of course costs a little more for the licence to run it on your vps legally so it would probably be best for you to start with linxus. Also, make sure you call your internet provider (if your hosting some vps’s from home) to make sure you have a T1 connection which is needed to have the speed for hosting a server.

I will probably have 2 windows servers and one linux.

ollie123:

I’m not sure, but I’d pay anything up to £20 a month for a VPS

Thats like, $30?

Read full topic
